meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tall.
meanings.sent1: Her tallnesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The tallnesses of the trees provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The tallnesses of the giraffe made it impossible to miss at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The tallnesses of the skyscrapers reached for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tallnesses of the mountains took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: The tallnesses of the bookshelf made it challenging to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: We measured the tallnesses of the building to determine its exact height.
meanings.sent3: The tallnesses of the cake towered over the table at the party.
meanings.sent4: The tallnesses of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The tallnesses of the sunflowers brightened up the garden.
